room_title: Escape room "Time Bomb" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Loved both rooms. Easily the best locations to do escape rooms. Can't wait for the new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Time Bomb" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Best escape room experience by far! Did both “Time Bomb” and “Patient Zero” and both were challenging and fun. The puzzles are logical and fit the story lines and all tie into each other. Patient Zero’s added bonus of the live actor added to the fun and to the challenge! Can’t wait to try the new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Time Bomb" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: I loved it! I thought the theme in the Time Bomb was clever, fun and unique. The flashlights, town entry and other props were a nice touch that I’ve heard other escape rooms don’t have. I would definitely take more people back here again if and when I can!

room_title: Escape room "Time Bomb" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Time Bomb was challenging and so much fun that we will definitely be back to do the other rooms as well. The attention to detail and the friendly staff make it a well worth while experience.

room_title: Escape room "Time Bomb" by Xtreme Escape Rooms in Detroit
review: Our group were all first timers. We did the Time Bomb room and had a blast...even though we made it out, pun intended. Cant wait to go back and try the other room as well as the new room in the making.
